prompt: Say hello and introduce yourself briefly in 2-3 sentences.

response.final_text: Hello, my name is LLaMA, and I'm an artificial intelligence designed to assist and communicate with users in a helpful and informative way. I'm a large language model, trained on a vast amount of text data to provide accurate and up-to-date information on a wide range of topics. I'm here to help answer your questions and provide assistance when needed.
